name: Umbra Aurora
description:
FGJ2022 prototype game. You have an ability to change between dark and light, to defeat the correct types of enemies.

The game is currently a prototype, so there is no goal. Just explore the world and defeat enemies.

Credits:
Alex Savander - 3D, Code, Music
Eeva Torkkola (Deminta) - 2D, Character 3D, Additional Code
